revised_title: The Travels and Scientific Contributions of Joseph Beete Jukes, F. R. S.
tldr: The article recounts the travels and scientific endeavors of Joseph Beete Jukes, a prominent geologist and naturalist in the 19th century. Jukes explored various locations, including Newfoundland, Australia, and other parts of the world, making significant contributions to the fields of geology and natural history. His adventures and experiences are documented through his letters and two-volume account of his life in Newfoundland.
